attributes.action: have all members of parliament checked for thir Body Mass Index (BMI)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most people know that the BMI measuremnt of whether you are "underweight, ok, overweight, obese or clinically obese" is a nonsense. They don't take into account sex, or muscle weight. I challenge all memebrs of parliament to have their BMI checked, as an incentive for them to make a change to a more realistic measurement.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
